summary: THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE EXPERIENCED SYMPTOMS OF NHTSA RECALL # 02-V-286-000 WHICH STATES THAT CERTAIN PASSENGER VEHICLES AND MINI VANS HAVE LOWER PINION BEARINGS IN THE POWER RACK AND PINION ASSEMBLY IN WHICH THE RETAINER TABS WERE NOT CRIMPED PROPERLY.  THE CONSUMERS VEHICLE WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL DUE TO VIN.   *NLM
